title: [My Fanart] Dryad Soraka

embed.description: Referenced from the Dryad Soraka splash art from League of Legends, owned by Riot Games Dryad Soraka

body: Please tell me what you think!

replies.body: What medium did you use. it looks like watercolor or colored pencil either way great job!

I was going to ask the same thing! 

I love how her hair is blended. This looks beautiful!

> [{quoted}](name=ToxicPrint,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=j49yq00F,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-07T15:07:27.746+0000)
>
> What medium did you use. it looks like watercolor or colored pencil either way great job!

I used Prisma colored pencils (those are wax-based), pastels, and acrylic paints
i think these are wax/pastel pencils or something like that
I'm assuming those black dots in the background are supposed to be stardust? Either way, they look reallyyyyyy cool!! Very beautiful!! Never stop drawing <3
i think its glitter but the camera angle wasn't set w/ the light on it???? idk
